channel.title: Making a RsPs need help need staff money envolved :P
channel.description:
Hey guys! yeah so im making a Rsps need a team to help me do it as it gets better we could look into payments,
People I need post a comment if you would be interested saying what role you would like to do.
Website designer / developer [0/1] Coder for server [0/1] Developer [0/1] In game staff Mods [0/3] In game Staff admins [0/2] just post a comment if your interested say what skills you have and if you join the team you will need Skype or teamviewer :P

item.title: Making a RsPs need help need staff money envolved :P
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

[quote=“marcbob, post:2, topic:444840”]I think you meant to post this here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,149.0.html

Also read the rules for that section here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,393334.0.html[/quote]

^ pretty much

You can’t offer rewards either, it is against our rules. You may repost this in the development teams section however please follow the correct layout. You may find that here.

Read full topic
item.source: Making a RsPs need help need staff money envolved :P
